title: MA61024: Computational Geometry - Quick Facts

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite: voidIntroduction, historical prospective, geometry preliminaries, convex hull algorithm in two and three dimensions, lower bounds, triangulation, Voronoi diagram, closest pair problems, duality in Voronoi diagrams, geometric searching, visibility, art gallery problem, arrangement of lines, sweep techniques, fortune sweep for voronoi diagrams, topological sweep for line arrangement, combinatorial geometry, intersection and union of rectangles, robust geometric computing, applications of computational geometry.
